title: Corpus Distillation
content: Anyone know of any tools or scripts that can help in corpus distillation ? I know of Peach Minset, but not other than that. Appreciate if anyone could share.

answers_data.content:
Some time ago I wrote minblox for that exact purpose. It relies on DynamoRIO. Compared to minset which uses pin tool, there isn't much of a difference. Tho I think actual set minimization part works faster than minset. 

Minblox tool is comprised of two parts.

Though, do bear in mind that I've only tested this for a specific case I needed it, so your mileage might vary.

comments.text: Why you didn't use the DrCov tool and then parse the (text format) log files? Just out of curiosity.
Sweet Thanks 0xea! Will definitely have a look at that :)
What about using Valgrind with Call grind to look at basic blocks? Have either of you tried this method?
@joxeankoret no particular reason, wrote it as a test...

answers_data.content: As far as I know, there is nothing like this public. However, you can use DrCov and do yourself the same thing as Minset does and even more powerful things. Indeed, I commonly use this DynamoRIO's tool, DrCov, for doing this exact same thing and others.

comments.text: Thanks joxean! ps. shout out from Syscan '14. Great talk :)
